document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Fame </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">fickle </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">food </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Upon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">shifting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">plate </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Whose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">table </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">once </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Guest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">second </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">time </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">set </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Whose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">crumbs </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">crows </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">inspect </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">ironic </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">caw </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">Flap </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">past </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Farmer's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">corn </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">Men </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">eat </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">die </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Fame is a fickle food
